DOC.brief_summary: The present investigation prospectively evaluate whether serial transvaginal ultrasonography Morphology Index ( MI ) reduce false positive result accurately distinguish benign malignant ovarian tumor . If change detection true positive case , result increase positive predictive value ovarian cancer screening .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Performance Morphology Index Surgical Decision-Making Ovarian Tumors
DOC.criteria: Women must enrol University Kentucky Ovarian Cancer Screening Program Patients document ovarian abnormality ultrasound Patients undergone prior hysterectomy eligible provide meet requirement entry study . Patients must Gynecologic Oncology Group performance status 03 . Life expectancy great 6 month require study participation . Ability understand willingness sign write informed consent document Patients enrol University Kentucky Ovarian Cancer Screening Program . Patients tolerate vaginal ultrasound procedure . Uncontrolled intercurrent illness include , limited , ongoing active infection , symptomatic congestive heart failure , unstable angina pectoris , cardiac arrhythmia , psychiatric illness/social situation would limit compliance study requirement . Patients refer pelvic symptom , know pelvic mass , history prior radiation , exclude investigation . History ovarian cancer . Prior bilateral salpingooophorectomy . Prisoners . Women currently pregnant .
